GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 01 March 2024

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Kalutara, Ratnapura, Galle and Matara
districts in the evening or night. Mainly dry weather will prevail elsewhere in the island.

F
airly strong winds about (30-40) kmph can be expected at times in North-western province and
in Hambantota district.

T
he public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize the damages caused
by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
